snippet: The Chesapeake Energy Corporation might delay asset sales, the company said on Friday, pushing its stock down to its lowest level in more than three years.
abstract: Chesapeake Energy Corporation announces that it may delay asset sales to preserve cash flow needed to comply with requirements of its corporate credit facility; announcement pushes company's stock down to its lowest level in more than three years.
lead_paragraph: The Chesapeake Energy Corporation might delay asset sales, the company said on Friday, pushing its stock down to its lowest level in more than three years.

headline.main: Chesapeake Energy Might Delay Asset Sales
headline.print_headline: Chesapeake Energy Might Delay Asset Sales
